import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Container, Row, Col, Navbar, Nav, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import CatImage from './cat.jpg'; // Import your cat image import DogImage from './dog.jpg'; // Import your dog image import BirdImage from './bird.jpg'; // Import your bird image const HomePage = () => { const cardStyle = { borderRadius: '20px', marginBottom: '40px', border: 'none', overflow: 'hidden', boxShadow: '0px 10px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)', transition: 'transform 0.3s ease', cursor: 'pointer', }; const imageStyle = { width: '100%', height: 'auto', borderRadius: '20px 20px 0 0', transition: 'transform 0.3s ease', }; const textStyle = { textAlign: 'center', fontSize: '1.8rem', fontWeight: 'bold', color: '#fff', position: 'absolute', bottom: '20px', left: '50%', transform: 'translateX(-50%)', zIndex: '2', opacity: '0', transition: 'opacity 0.3s ease', }; const hoverEffect = { '&:hover': { transform: 'scale(1.05)', '& $textStyle': { opacity: '0', }, '& $imageStyle': { filter: 'brightness(70%)', }, }, }; return ( <> Home
About Us Contact Us

Cats Gallery Dogs Gallery Birds Gallery ); }; export default HomePage;
